text: The 2002-03 Brown Bears women's ice hockey team represented Brown University. ==Regular season== Jessica Link led the Bears in scoring with 39 points (20 goals and 19 assists). Link's 20 goals led the team and her 19 assists were good enough for third overall. Link tied for the ECAC lead in short-handed points with three.
